Posts.Content: frances1 wrote:  I started on Anastrozole (Arimidex) on August 2010, it was fine till one month ago when I started  having joint pain in my neck shoulders and especially in my hands and mostly the left hand were they removed 22 Lymph nodes, its very weak, and severe pain in my thumb were I have difficulty to move it, the doctor is not sure if its from the Anastrozole or if its arthritis..Did any of you experienced the same symptoms..I was thinking to ask the doctor to change me  to Arimidex instead of generic , I am not sure if it makes a difference..Is anyone taking Anastrozole and the ones on Arimedex did you experience any side effects, please advice. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Side effect of Anastrozole frances1 lauri

Posts.Content: frances1 wrote: I just be diagnosed with invasive lobular carcinoma stage 2 with er and pr positive,the tumor is 2.7x2.3x0.9 cm with no lymph involvement.  The doctor gave me  two options either chemo to shrink the tumor or hormonal blocker to shrink.but his preference is chemo stating that will give me 7% more chance than the hormonal blocker. which means 20% chance that cancer will come back by hormonal and 13% by chemo.and than surgery and radiation... Iam very confused..does anyone went through the same..and what did you do...I was hoping to do the surgery first and to  do the oncotype dx test and than see if chemo needed. I heard also that eating raw  vegetable food and juices will reduce breast cancer returning. Help.. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: SURGERY OR CHEMO FIRST frances1 kiminfo
